metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4069 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
vim is vulnerable to Use After Free

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4069` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.8
vim-athena - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.8
vim-common - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.8
vim-gnome - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.8
vim-gtk - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.8
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.8
vim-gui-common - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.8
vim-nox - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.8
vim-runtime - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.8
vim-tiny - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.8
xxd - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.8').
